default.source:
<style>

@keyframes scroll-in {
  0% {
  opacity: 0;
    transform: translate3d(0px, 50px, 0px);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94);
  }
  100% {
  opacity: 1;
    transform: none;
  }
}

</style>
